content.title: AVM Embolization
content.description: Endovascular embolization techniques for arteriovenous malformations

key_concepts.details: Target nidus (central tangle) for cure; feeding vessel embolization alone ineffective and may worsen
Ethanol (most effective but highest risk), Onyx, n-BCA glue, coils
Superselective catheterization; staged procedures often required for large AVMs
Non-target embolization, skin/tissue necrosis, nerve injury, pulmonary embolism of agents

content.clinical_significance: Embolization is primary treatment for high-flow AVMs; cure rates 20-40%

primary_sources: Lee BB et al. J Vasc Surg 2015
